name: LudusSimplus
description:
LudusSimplus is a solo game project scripted using Bolt, hand-drawn assets and animations. It is a Mario-like platformer made in 3 weeks for a project course.

Controls:

  • ESC: Pauses the game
  • A - D: Left and right movement
  • E: Action button
  • SHIFT: Sprinting
  • SPACE: Jumping
  • Hold S: Fall through designated platform

Unity Version: 2020.3.19.f1

Made by: Jana Scheibner

Bitbucket Repo: https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/2022_t-t3_scheibner_jana_final/src/main/

This game was created by students of the Game Design section at the  University of Europe for Applied Sciences.
